nodes.name: DATE FIELDS
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    *,
    DAY(BU_DT) as DAY_OF_MONTH,
    MONTH(BU_DT) as MONTH_OF_YEAR,
    YEAR(BU_DT) as YR
from fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types

fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: WEEKID
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT *,
 CASE 
    WHEN DAY_OF_MONTH <=5 THEN '01' 
    WHEN DAY_OF_MONTH > 5 and DAY_OF_MONTH <= 12 THEN '02' 
    WHEN DAY_OF_MONTH > 12 and DAY_OF_MONTH <= 20 THEN '03'
    ELSE '04'
END as WEEKID
from fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: WEEKLY CONSOLIDATION
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    IDNRK,
    YR,
    MONTH_OF_YEAR,
    WEEKID,
    BU_DT_monthname,
    SUM(MENGE) AS WEEKLY_DEMAND,
    SUM(MENGE * VERPR) AS PO_VALUE
FROM fire_temp_table
WHERE VERPR IS NOT NULL AND MENGE IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    IDNRK,
    YR,
    MONTH_OF_YEAR,
    WEEKID,
    BU_DT_monthname
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    IDNRK,
    MAX(BUDAT) as MAX_BUDAT
FROM fire_temp_table
GROUP BY
    IDNRK
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    aa.IDNRK,
    aa.MAKTX as MATERIAL_NAME,
    aa.MEINS as BASE_UNIT,
    aa.VERPR as UNIT_PRICE,
    aa.MSLLT as LOT_SIZE
FROM tempTable1 aa INNER JOIN tempTable2 bb
on aa.IDNRK = bb.IDNRK AND aa.BUDAT = bb.MAX_BUDAT
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    ay.*, ax.*,
    '00000000' as BUDAT,
    0 as MENGE,
    0 as VERPR
FROM tempTable1 ax JOIN tempTable2 ay

nodes.name: FILTER
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    LIFNR,
    LAND1,
    PSTLZ as PINCODE,
    if(LEFT(PSTLZ, 2)='11',2,7) as LEAD_TIME_DAYS
from fire_temp_table
WHERE
    LAND1 = 'IN'
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types

nodes.name: MIN LEAD TIME
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    LIFNR,
    FIRST(LAND1) as LAND1,
    FIRST(PINCODE) as PINCODE,
    MIN(LEAD_TIME_DAYS) as LEAD_TIME_DAYS
from fire_temp_table
GROUP BY
    LIFNR
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    IDNRK,
    FIRST(MATERIAL_NAME) as MATERIAL_NAME,
    FIRST(BASE_UNIT) as BASE_UNIT,
    MIN(UNIT_PRICE) as UNIT_PRICE,
    MIN(LOT_SIZE) as LOT_SIZE
FROM fire_temp_table
GROUP BY
    IDNRK
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    IDNRK,
    MAX(EISBE) as CURRENT_SS_OVELALL
from fire_temp_table
GROUP BY
    IDNRK
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    IDNRK,
    YR,
    MONTH_OF_YEAR,
    SUM(WEEKLY_DEMAND) as MONTHLY_DEMAND,
    COUNT(*) as NO_WEEKS
from 
    fire_temp_table
GROUP BY
    IDNRK,
    YR,
    MONTH_OF_YEAR
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    *,
    MONTHLY_DEMAND/NO_WEEKS as WEEKLY_DEMAND
from 
    fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    aa.IDNRK,
    aa.YR,
    aa.MONTH_OF_YEAR,
    aa.BU_DT_monthname,
    aa.WEEKID,
    bb.WEEKLY_DEMAND,
    aa.PO_VALUE
FROM tempTable1 aa join tempTable2 bb ON
    aa.IDNRK = bb.IDNRK and aa.YR = bb.YR and aa.MONTH_OF_YEAR = bb.MONTH_OF_YEAR
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Column Formats for the CSV
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns
